Tesla Announces Date for Second Quarter 2020 Financial Results and Webcast | Tesla Investor Relations Cybertruck Foundation Logo Cybertruck Foundation Logo Cybertruck Logo Skip to main content Tesla homepage Investor Relations Skip to main content Dashboard Impact SEC Filings Corporate Governance Press Releases Account Press Releases Press Releases Back Tesla&nbsp;Announces&nbsp;Date for Second Quarter 2020 Financial Results and Webcast Globe Newswire Jul 8, 2020 PALO ALTO, Calif., July 08, 2020 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Tesla will post its financial results for the second quarter of 2020 after market close on Wednesday, July 22, 2020. At that time, Tesla will issue a brief advisory containing a link to the Q2 2020 update, which will be available on Tesla’s Investor Relations website. Tesla management will hold a live question and answer webcast that day at 2:30 p.m. Pacific Time (5:30 p.m. Eastern Time) to discuss the Company’s financial and business results and outlook. What: &nbsp;Date of Tesla Q2 2020 Financial Results and Q&amp;A Webcast When: &nbsp;Wednesday, July 22, 2020 Time: &nbsp;2:30 p.m. Pacific Time / 5:30 p.m. Eastern Time Q2 2020 Update: &nbsp; http://ir.tesla.com &nbsp;&nbsp; Webcast: &nbsp; http://ir.tesla.com &nbsp;(live and replay) Approximately two hours after the Q&amp;A session, an archived version of the webcast will be available on the Company’s website. For additional information, please visit&nbsp; http://ir.tesla.com . &nbsp; Footer Tesla © 2026 Subscription Preferences Contact &amp; FAQ Privacy &amp; Legal
